title: Word Collocation Strategy Instruction for [Self-Directed] ESL Learners: Science-Focused Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English vocabulary and grammatical comprehension
context.additional_context: Emphasizing collocation, transitivity, and complementation education for science text analysis, promoting self-directed learning in limited technological environments (smartphone-based) for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Identify morphological patterns of scientific vocabulary with 80% accuracy using online dictionaries and text analysis tools
Reconstruct sentence structures of three or more sentences in specialized texts by applying word combination problem-solving strategies
Perform self-directed learning at least twice weekly and submit learning records through an automated feedback system

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
